summary: Add a new video section featuring 'Glass Half Empty' video between the experience and contact sections. The implementation will use HTML5 video element with custom styling matching the portfolio's glass-morphism design theme, positioned appropriately for non-HD video quality with play/pause controls.

action_plan.description: Add video section HTML structure in index.html between experience section (line 207) and contact section (line 210). Include section container, title, video element with controls, and description text.
Add navigation link for video section in navbar menu to maintain consistent navigation structure.

Create CSS styling for video section in main.css. Apply glass-morphism design patterns consistent with other sections (rgba backgrounds, backdrop-filter blur, border styling). Size video appropriately for non-HD quality with responsive design.
Add mobile responsive styling for video section to ensure proper display on smaller screens, including video sizing and layout adjustments.
Update JavaScript in main-static.js to include video section in fade-in animations and scroll-based reveal effects to match other sections.
Test video playback functionality, ensure controls work properly, verify responsive design across different screen sizes, and confirm glass-morphism styling matches portfolio aesthetic.

risks: Video file size (16MB) may impact page load performance on slower connections
Non-HD video quality may appear pixelated if sized too large
Browser compatibility issues with .mov format (may need fallback formats)
Mobile data usage concerns for users on limited data plans
Video controls styling may not perfectly match glass-morphism theme
dependencies: Current CSS glass-morphism design system and custom properties
Responsive design framework already in place
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
